channel.title: open source on Ash Drake
channel.description: Recent content in open source on Ash Drake

item.title: Mar 1
item.description: I’ve recently signed on to help out more with Exercism, by becoming a maintainer for the Python track. I’m still figuring out how to work on such a large project; this past weekend I managed to send an email & Github ping that should have gone to my subteam of 3-5 Python maintainers, to the whole (150 people) group of maintainers; I messed something up trying to rebase from master and it was gross.
